description: This is a Qwik framework component implementing a flower generator UI with reactive state, styling, and lifecycle management.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main Qwik component rendering the flower generator interface.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up a side effect with timers that update the component state after delays.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates a reactive store for component state management.
